faq.ques: What types of roofing materials do you offer?
faq.ans: We offer a wide variety of roofing materials, including asphalt shingles, metal roofing, slate, tile, and flat roofing systems like TPO and EPDM. We’ll work with you to select the best material based on your budget, style preferences, and long-term needs.

faq.ques: How do I know if my roof needs repair or replacement?
faq.ans: Signs of roof damage include leaks, missing or damaged shingles, and visible wear. We recommend a professional inspection to assess whether a repair is sufficient or if a replacement is necessary. Feel free to reach out for a free inspection and honest recommendation.

faq.ques: How long does a typical roofing project take?
faq.ans: Most residential roofing projects are completed within 1-3 days, depending on the size and scope of the work. Commercial projects and specialty roofing materials may take longer. We’ll give you a clear timeline at the start of your project and keep you updated every step of the way.

faq.ques: Is Affordable Roofing licensed and insured?
faq.ans: Yes, we are fully licensed and insured. Our team is highly trained to meet industry standards, ensuring a safe and secure roofing installation. Working with a licensed and insured company gives you peace of mind and protects your investment.

faq.ques: How often should I have my roof inspected?
faq.ans: We recommend a roof inspection at least once a year, especially before and after harsh weather seasons. Regular inspections help detect minor issues before they become major problems, saving you time and money in the long run.

faq.ques: Do you provide free estimates for your services?
faq.ans: Yes, we offer free, no-obligation estimates for all of our services. Contact us today to schedule your consultation, and we’ll give you an accurate quote based on your roofing needs.
